text: Anthoinite is an aluminum tungsten oxide mineral with the chemical formula AlWO(OH). Its type locality is Maniema in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.Anthoinite on mindat.org Anthoinite found in Rwanda == References == == External links == * Anthoinite data sheet * Anthoinite on the Handbook of Mineralogy Category:Aluminium minerals Category:Tungsten minerals Category:Oxide minerals
title: Anthoinite
